mapper.sql: a.dcd AS "dcd", a.dname AS "dname", a.location AS "location", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.dyp AS "dyp", a.avgd AS "avgd", a.avgtmp AS "avgtmp", a.z AS "z", a.q AS "q", a.w AS "w", a.sarea AS "sarea", a.carea AS "carea", a.elose AS "elose", a.lgtd AS "lgtd", a.lgtd AS "lttd", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
,p.pid AS "pid", p.pname AS "pname",p.fpath AS "fpath",p.disc AS "disc" FROM IA_Z_DROUGHT a left join REL_P_DROUGHT d on a.dcd = d.dcd left join IA_P_BASE p on d.pid = p.pid
1=1
and a.dname like '%'+#{dname}+'%'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by a.startdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IA_Z_DROUGHT( dcd, dname , location, startdate, enddate, dyp, avgd, avgtmp, z , q , w, sarea, carea, elose, lgtd, lttd, remark ) VALUES ( #{dcd}, #{dname}, #{location}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{dyp}, #{avgd}, #{avgtmp}, #{z}, #{q}, #{w}, #{sarea}, #{carea}, #{elose}, #{lgtd}, #{lttd}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IA_Z_DROUGHT SET dname = #{dname}, location = #{location}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, dyp = #{dyp}, avgd = #{avgd}, avgtmp = #{avgtmp}, mxatmp = #{mxatmp}, lgtd = #{lgtd}, lttd = #{lttd}, z = #{z}, q = #{q}, w = #{w}, sarea = #{sarea}, elose = #{elose}, carea = #{carea}, remark = #{remark} WHERE dcd = #{dcd}
